titleStmt.title: The Furies· With vertues encomium. Or The image of honour. In two bookes of epigrammes, satyricall and encomiasticke. By R.N.
titleStmt.author: Niccols, Richard, 1584-1616.

notesStmt.note: "Vertues encomium" has separate dated title page; register is continuous.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
